scripts.dev: npm run sync-env && concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && venv\Scripts\activate && python -m uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.debug:full: npm run debug:api && npm run debug:courses
